title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique:  embroidered in deflected and withdrawn element work, and needle lace stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Rectangular sampler with many small bands and squares of geometric patterns, in blues, greens, yellows, pinks and reds on white. The right side is dominated by two large areas of deflected element work in red and green.

exhibitions.title: Hella Jongerius Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique:  embroidered in deflected and withdrawn element work, and needle lace stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-160.
